itinerary.mapNote: First STF hut. Torneträsk lake views. 510m.
Remote subarctic hut. Birch forest gives way to tundra. 720m.
After Tjäktjapasset 1150m — route highpoint. Mountain plateau. 770m.
Base for Sweden's highest peak 2098m. Full-service mountain lodge. 690m.
Trail end. Bus to Kiruna. Sámi community. 470m.

waypoints.name: Kebnekaise Summit (South)
waypoints.note: Sweden's highest peak. 2-day guided ascent from fjällstation.

waypoints.name: Tjäktjapasset
waypoints.note: Kungsleden highpoint. Open tundra above tree line.

waypoints.name: Abisko National Park
waypoints.note: Start. Known for most reliable Northern Lights viewing in Sweden.

waypoints.name: Ammarnas STF Area
waypoints.note: Southern Kungsleden STF landmark. Full 440km route reference.

waypoints.name: Reindeer Herding Areas
waypoints.note: Sámi reindeer herding corridor. Thousands of reindeer in migration.
